# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


1. ACCORDING TO BOLIVIAN SUGAR INSTITUTE SOURCE BOLIVIA HAS
SOLD ABOUT 9,000 M.T. OF SUGAR TO AMEROP (U.S. BROKER)
AT PRICE OF US $535 PER M.T. AMEROP PORBABLY WILL RESELL
IN EUROPE. ABOUT 6,000 M.T. IS FROM STEPHEN LEIGH MILL
AND 3,000 M.T. FROM GUABIRA. GUABIRA EXPECTED TO SELL IN
SEPTEMBER TO COVER U.S. QUOTA ALLOTMENT.
BREWIN
